LanguageData.VGE_GravFieldAmplifier.label: grav field amplifier
LanguageData.VGE_GravFieldAmplifier.description: An advanced ultratech device that dramatically increases the size of a gravship. It extends the area in which substructure can be built, and increases the amount of substructure that a gravship can support. Must be built near a grav engine. A gravship can support up to four grav field amplifiers.
